entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
